title: Bulletin of the Institute of Historical Research: Special Supplement

additional-notes: This is a British publication. Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US.

This is a monographic series.  Before concluding a volume is in the public domain, search for renewals for a volume under its distinctive title. We have not systematically checked volume titles for this serial.
